originalText.text: Saw them perform at USDAN Summer Camp for the Arts. Stellar!! So full-out, engaging, and inspiring - with movement as well as words - for the campers.

text.text: Saw them perform at USDAN Summer Camp for the Arts. Stellar!! So full-out, engaging, and inspiring - with movement as well as words - for the campers.

originalText.text: Last night I attended a Kwanza Celebration at NJPAC hosted by The Forces of Nature Dance Company with guest Les Nubians. The choreography,  dance, live and recorded music, and overall message filled my wife and I with delight, pride and a deep respect for the richness that is the African diaspora. Of course the dancers were absolutely beautiful, both women and men, and brought the stage to life. If you are lucky enough to have this Dance Company come to your local theater, don't hesitate to get a ticket because I'm going to get your seat! Yes, they are that good...

originalText.text: I just went to Kwanza Celebration Regeneration Night, and they brought the house down! It was unpredictable-in a good way. Get your tickets as fast as you can, it’ll be sold out faster than you can say “Forces Of Nature”!!!
